page.title: Built to Keep You Moving
page.name: s1p1
page.laserbeam:
Blackberry® 10.
Built to Keep You Moving.
page.body:
• Introduces a fluid and effortless new experience that makes it a pleasure to make things happen
  • Delivers ease and speed by removing all of the little roadblocks you experience on other smartphones that take up valuable time
page.text: The new Blackberry® Z10 smartphone, BlackBerry® Q10 smartphone, and BlackBerry® Q5 smartphone ship with the Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ processor offering an unprecedented combination of performance, rich multi-media, graphics, wireless connectivity and power efficiency.

page.title: What is Snapdragon Processors
page.name: s1p2
page.body: Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ all-in-one processors give you technologies that work faster, smoother, and more efficiently. That’s because everything is designed to work together, delivering the ultimate mobile experience.

page.title: What Makes Snapdragon Special
page.name: s1p3
page.body:
The components on Snapdragon processors — CPU, GPU, modem, GPS, multimedia and other technologies — are built together from the ground up, meaning that Qualcomm designs, integrates and delivers a complete system-on-a-chip.

The entire system is purpose-built and integrated to work together. It delivers a great mobile experience with extended battery life on BlackBerry® 10 devices - no matter what you’re doing.

page.title: Customer Benefits
page.name: s3p1
page.laserbeam: Customer Benefits of the Combination of Blackberry® 10 + Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ Processor
page.body: Blackberry Hub • BBM Video With Screen Share • Gaming • Blackberry Browser • Audio • Camera

page.title: Blackberry HUB & BBM Video
page.name: s3p2
page.laserbeam: Blackberry® Hub & BBM Video with Screen Share
page.body:
The Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ processor inside BlackBerry 10 devices includes Qualcomm's own custom-designed GPU and CPU, providing the processing power to deliver dazzling, complex, graphics and rich UIs that respond immediately to user interaction while maintaining power efficiency.

Advanced compositing and fast graphics rendering ensure smooth, flicker-free animation. And the entire SoC works seamlessly to deliver 1080p HD 30FPS video capture and playback, taking the sharing experience to another level and helping you to get a closer to real-life conversation with BBM video calls.

page.title: Gaming and Browser
page.name: s3p3
page.body:
The custom GPU inside the Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ processor give BlackBerry 10 devices the processing power to deliver rich 3D gaming experiences on the go and at home on your HD display.

Web browsing is blazing fast, and you can download large documents, photos and videos with ease.

page.title: Audio and Camera
page.name: s3p4
page.body:
Bring your home stereo system with you, thanks to the high fidelity surround sound audio capabilities provided by the Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ processor and BlackBerry® 10

Create the perfect shot every time with Time Shift mode and the power of the Snapdragon processor on the BlackBerry 10 devices.
